sentences.sContent: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her.
sentences.sCn: 她肌腱受了这么多损伤，这真地使她致残了。

sentences.sContent: ...Writer friends of mine pay good money to get the Freedom software that enables them to disable the very Internet connections that seemed so emancipating not long ago...

synos.tran: 使失去能力；使残废；使无资格

remMethod.val: dis(消失) ＋ able(能…的) → (使)能力消失 → 丧失能力

words.tran: 使…失去能力（disable的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: If an injury or illness disables someone, it affects them so badly that it restricts the way that they can live their life
